duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop conceptual engineering sketches of proposed layouts and system installation/integration.
Provide Configuration Management support for all equipment controls drawings.
Assist with Windows10 migration and network expansion activities.
Validate cable testing data against requirements.
Provide on-site, real-time support to resolve technical issues arising during construction, installation, and test activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Engineering degree; degree in Electrical Engineering preferred.
